Latest.Author: (github-actions[bot])
Latest.Description:
## Changes

## üöÄ Features

- feat: move shareable policies out of experimental @olblak (#1973)
- feat: Allow to enable/disable working branch for all scm plugins @olblak (#1955)
- feat: Add conditional Target @olblak (#1962)
- feat: add flux autodiscovery plugin @olblak (#1950)
- feat: golang autodiscovery should follow conventional commits @olblak (#1947)
- feat: fleet autodiscovery should follow conventionnal commits @olblak (#1946)

## üêõ Bug Fixes

- fix(dockerdigest): Allow to specify none linux os @olblak (#1981)
- fix(golang): autodiscovery should run go mod tidy from sub folders @olblak (#1957)
- fix(helm): ignore containers when tag or repository are not specified @olblak (#1956)

## üß∞ Maintenance

- deps: bump Golang version to 1.22.1 @updateclibot (#1971)
- Update Golang module golang.org/x/oauth2 @updateclibot (#1976)
- Update Golang module github.com/stretchr/testify @updateclibot (#1969)
- refactor: remove useless git checkout after a git clone @olblak (#1966)
- Update Golang module github.com/hashicorp/hcl/v2 @updateclibot (#1967)
- chore(deps): Bump actions/add-to-project from 0.5.0 to 0.6.0 @dependabot (#1961)
- Update Golang module github.com/drone/go-scm @updateclibot (#1953)
- chore(deps): Bump helm.sh/helm/v3 from 3.14.1 to 3.14.2 @dependabot (#1952)
- Update Golang module golang.org/x/mod @updateclibot (#1944)
- clean: always run fleet autodiscovery test @olblak (#1948)
- chore(deps): Bump helm.sh/helm/v3 from 3.14.0 to 3.14.1 @dependabot (#1934)

## Contributors

@dependabot, @dependabot[bot], @olblak, @updateclibot and @updateclibot[bot]

üöÄ Features

  • feat: move shareable policies out of experimental @olblak (#1973)
  • feat: Allow to enable/disable working branch for all scm plugins @olblak (#1955)
  • feat: Add conditional Target @olblak (#1962)

üêõ Bug Fixes

  • fix(golang): autodiscovery should run go mod tidy from sub folders @olblak (#1957)
  • fix(helm): ignore containers when tag or repository are not specified @olblak (#1956)

üß∞ Maintenance

  • Update Golang module github.com/drone/go-scm @updateclibot (#1953)
  • chore(deps): Bump helm.sh/helm/v3 from 3.14.1 to 3.14.2 @dependabot (#1952)
  • Update Golang module golang.org/x/mod @updateclibot (#1944)
  • clean: always run fleet autodiscovery test @olblak (#1948)

Latest.Name: v0.74.0

Changelog.Author: (github-actions[bot])
Changelog.Description:
## Changes

## üöÄ Features

- Add option to disable Helm Version Increment @olblak (#694)

## üêõ Bug Fixes

- fix: check if the extension is not `yaml` and not `yml` @kuisathaverat (#732)
- fix(github) initialize the headbranch  @dduportal (#717)
- Fix scm resource initialization @olblak (#700)

## üß∞ Maintenance

- chore(deps): Bump github.com/heimdalr/dag from 1.1.1 to 1.2.1 @dependabot (#733)
- chore(deps): Bump github.com/aws/aws-sdk-go from 1.44.27 to 1.44.37 @dependabot (#727)
- chore(deps): Bump github.com/stretchr/testify from 1.7.2 to 1.7.3 @dependabot (#728)
- chore: link to issues list instead of blank form @lemeurherve (#726)
- [updatecli] Bump Golang version to 1.18.3 @updateclibot (#720)
- Fix updatecli manifest for golang update @olblak (#719)
- pkg/core/config: replace deprecated `strings.Title` with `cases.Title` @jlevesy (#715)
- chore(deps): Bump github.com/stretchr/testify from 1.7.1 to 1.7.2 @dependabot (#711)
- chore(deps): Bump github.com/aws/aws-sdk-go from 1.44.24 to 1.44.27 @dependabot (#712)
- chore(deps): Bump github.com/aws/aws-sdk-go from 1.44.19 to 1.44.24 @dependabot (#707)
- chore(deps): Bump helm.sh/helm/v3 from 3.8.2 to 3.9.0 @dependabot (#702)
- chore(deps): Bump goreleaser/goreleaser-action from 2 to 3 @dependabot (#704)
- chore(deps): Bump go.mozilla.org/sops/v3 from 3.7.2 to 3.7.3 @dependabot (#696)
- chore(deps): Bump github.com/aws/aws-sdk-go from 1.44.10 to 1.44.19 @dependabot (#701)
- [updatecli] Bump Golang version to 1.18.2 @updateclibot (#695)
- chore(deps): Bump docker/setup-qemu-action from 1 to 2 @dependabot (#682)
- chore(deps): Bump docker/setup-buildx-action from 1 to 2 @dependabot (#684)
- chore(deps): Bump github.com/moby/buildkit from 0.10.2 to 0.10.3 @dependabot (#686)
- chore(deps): Bump github.com/aws/aws-sdk-go from 1.44.5 to 1.44.10 @dependabot (#690)
- chore(deps): Bump docker/login-action from 1 to 2 @dependabot (#683)
- chore(deps): Bump updatecli/updatecli-action from 1.32.0 to 1.33.0 @dependabot (#688)

## Contributors

@dduportal, @dependabot, @dependabot[bot], @jlevesy, @kuisathaverat, @lemeurherve, @olblak, @updateclibot and @updateclibot[bot]
